title: BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop for Hard Floors and Area Rugs, Black, 2554A
descriptions:
Introducing the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop for Hard Floors and Area Rugs in sleek Black (model 2554A)! This innovative cleaning powerhouse not only vacuums and mops but also supports a great cause - the BISSELL Pet Foundation.

With a rotating brush system, a wide 10.5-inch cleaning path, and improved edge cleaning capabilities, this cordless cleaner makes cleaning your floors a breeze. The 36V Lithium-Ion battery provides up to 30 minutes of cleaning time, giving you plenty of power to tackle any mess.

The CrossWave is compatible with a variety of surfaces including tile, sealed wood floors, laminate, linoleum, rubber floor mats, pressed wood floors, and area rugs. The two-tank technology ensures that clean and dirty water are kept separate for optimal cleaning results.

Plus, with features like Wi-Fi connectivity, self-cleaning cycles, and included accessories like trial formulas and brush rolls, this all-in-one cleaner is a must-have for any home. And with the added bonus of supporting the BISSELL Pet Foundation, you can feel good about your purchase. Don't miss out on the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max - the ultimate cleaning solution for your home!

Introducing the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop, the ultimate solution for keeping your hard floors and area rugs sparkling clean! This sleek black cleaning powerhouse is not just any ordinary vacuum - it's a game-changer.

Say goodbye to the hassle of cords with its cordless design and powerful 36V Lithium-Ion battery, providing up to 30 minutes of uninterrupted cleaning time. Its rotating brush system and improved edge cleaning capabilities ensure every nook and cranny is spotless.

Compatible with a variety of surfaces including tile, laminate, and area rugs, this all-in-one cleaner is a must-have for any home. And the best part? With the BISSELL CrossWave, you're not just investing in a cleaner home, but also supporting a good cause - the BISSELL Pet Foundation.

Don't miss out on the chance to experience the convenience and effectiveness of the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max. Order yours today and take your cleaning routine to the next level!

The swivel head and carry handle make it easy to maneuver around furniture and tight spaces. Plus, with a 36V Lithium-Ion battery providing up to 30 minutes of cleaning time, you can cover a lot of ground in one go. 

Not only does this cleaner excel in performance, but it also supports a great cause - the BISSELL Pet Foundation. So you can feel good about your purchase knowing that you're helping animals in need.

Experience the convenience of multi-surface cleaning, including tile, sealed wood floors, laminate, and more. The improved edge cleaning and self-cleaning cycle ensure a thorough clean every time. And with included accessories like trial formulas and brush rolls, you'll have everything you need to achieve a sparkling clean home.

Don't miss out on the opportunity to make cleaning a breeze with the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop. Get yours today and enjoy a cleaner, fresher home with ease!
